title: elliya mathurApurapu
sahitya:
elliya mathurApurapu elliya tA billuhabba elliya sOdaramAvane


anupallavi

  elliya mallara sanga gulla kamsanu namage elliya janmada vairiye sakhiye


caraNam 1    vrndAvanadoLagiruva vrkSa jAtigaLella ondondu phaladindali sandaNitave 
kunda kusumadaliruva mandiradali cakOra ondondu sukha bharitave 
andu mAdhava namma hondi karaviDida nandana kandana caritave sakhiye
    caraNam 2    akrUra tAnella acyutage eDemADi A krUranenisidane 
vakra mArgava kUDi vaniteyara usireNisi cakradharanagalisidane 
akramisi suralOka pArijAtavanambujAkSige tandittane sakhiye
    caraNam 3    nIra cellATadoLu nilisi nammellara nAriyarige cellidane 
mOre mOre nODi adharAmrtagaLa sAri sAri savidumbane 
dvArakApuravAsa purandara viTTala sEri nammanu salahuvane sakhiye
